<Text: The Jane Pickens Show:  It was a music program aired in a 15-minute time-slot, and starred popular radio singer Jane Pickens.>
Triplets:<The Jane Pickens Show
2:
--------------------
Text: The Jane Pickens Show:  Music programs aired in 15-minute time-slots were a common type of show on the then-"Big 4" U.S. networks, with many popular singers such as Dinah Shore, Eddie Fisher, Perry Como etc. doing such series.
Triplets:<The Jane Pickins
3:
--------------------
Text: The Jane Pickens Show:  They typically ran for 12-13 minutes excluding the ads, and many accompanied the evening news, which in those days was also 15-minutes.
Triplets:<The Jane Pickins Show
